    • Method Detail

      • computeRelativeFrequency

        public static int computeRelativeFrequency(double meter)
        Returns the step distance in feet for route calculation. The step distance starts at 30 ft, the DTED 3 post distance. A 30 ft step distance is maintained up to a maximum of 1000 steps, after which the step distance is increased to maintain 1000 steps
        Parameters:
        meter - The length of the route (m)
        Returns:
        The step distance (ft)
